mapper.insert: INSERT INTO replys( reply_no , user_no , content_no , reply , reg_date, par_reply_no) VALUES ( seq_replys_reply_no.nextval, #{userNo} , #{contentNo} , #{reply}, SYSDATE, 0 #{parentReplyNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( select r.reply_no reply_no, r.user_no user_no, r.content_no content_no, r.reply reply, r.reg_date reg_date, r.par_reply_no par_reply_no, u.name userName, u.photo userPhoto FROM replys r inner join users u on r.user_no = u.user_no WHERE r.content_no = #{replyValueNo} AND r.par_reply_no = 0 ORDER BY r.reply_no DESC) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum} ORDER BY reply_no DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( select r.reply_no reply_no, r.user_no user_no, r.content_no content_no, r.reply reply, r.reg_date reg_date, r.par_reply_no par_reply_no, u.name userName, u.photo userPhoto FROM replys r inner join users u on r.user_no = u.user_no WHERE par_reply_no = #{replyValueNo} ORDER BY reply_no DESC) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= 1000000 ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN 0 AND 1000000 ORDER BY reply_no DESC
